articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Marbotte's website
articles.description: Personal website to publish some info about my projects in biodiversity and bioinformatics, and occasionally other stuffs!
articles.contents:
I am Marius Bottin, a French ecologist living in Bogot√°, Colombia.
I am an independent researcher and I work mainly in biodiversity database management and biodiversity analyses.
This website is very new, but I will try to give it some structure over time, the idea is to publish some information about my work and the projects I participate to.
